task.title: Troubleshooting
task.shortdesc: Having problems? See if we can help!

context.p: Here are the answers to some common issues you may encounter while using this product.

li.b: How do I reset the machine if I selected the wrong function?

ul.li: The load might be too heavy. Press the Start/Stop button and give the machine time to cool.
The recipe might also be finished. If so, remove from bowl.
